items.title: Implement one high-value reliability improvement
items.user_story: As a maintainer, I want one focused reliability improvement implemented with tests and memory updates.

items.title: Refine CLI or compaction UX based on findings
items.user_story: As a user, I want clearer feedback from CLI workflows and compaction operations.

items.title: Stabilize edge-case behavior discovered during validation
items.user_story: As a maintainer, I want known edge cases fixed so regressions are less likely.
